story.soThat: I can practice meditation with guidance

subtasks.subtask: Create MeditationLibraryScreen widget with tab navigation
Implement category tabs (All, Stress Relief, Sleep, Focus, Anxiety)
Create MeditationCard widget with thumbnail, title, duration, category badge
Implement grid/list view toggle
Add loading shimmer effect for content loading
Implement pull-to-refresh for library updates

task.description: Create meditation content data structure and seed data

subtasks.subtask: Design meditation content model (id, title, description, duration, category, audio_url, thumbnail_url)
Create 20-30 meditation entries with varied durations (5-20 min)
Organize meditations across categories (Stress Relief: 6-8, Sleep: 6-8, Focus: 5-7, Anxiety: 5-7)
Source or generate audio files (MP3 format, 128kbps)
Create or source thumbnail images (300x300px, WEBP format)
Create search bar with debounced text input (300ms delay)
Implement real-time search filtering by title and description
Add duration filter (5-10 min, 10-15 min, 15-20 min)
Implement category filter chips with multi-select
Create filter bottom sheet UI
Add "Clear filters" button
Create meditation_favorites table in Drift (local SQLite)
Create meditation_favorites table in Supabase with RLS policies
Implement toggleFavorite() use case
Add heart icon to MeditationCard with animation on tap
Create "Favorites" filter tab
Implement sync between Drift and Supabase for favorites
Integrate just_audio package for audio playback
Implement MeditationAudioService with streaming support
Add audio preloading for smoother playback start (<500ms)
Implement buffering indicator during stream loading
Add error handling for network failures with retry
Store audio URLs in Supabase Storage or CDN
Create meditation_downloads table in Drift
Implement downloadMeditation() use case with progress tracking
Add download button to MeditationCard with progress indicator
Store audio files in app documents directory
Implement tier check: show premium upsell if free user
Add "Downloaded" filter tab showing offline-available meditations
Implement download queue (max 3 concurrent downloads)
Create meditation_sessions table in Drift and Supabase
Track meditation completion (completed_at, duration_listened, meditation_id)
Show completion checkmark on MeditationCard
Add "Completed" count badge to card
Implement sync for session data across devices
Unit tests: search/filter logic, favorites toggle, download queue
Widget tests: library UI, category tabs, search bar, filter chips
Integration test: end-to-end meditation browsing, favoriting, and download flow
Achieve 80%+ code coverage

criterion.text: Categories: Stress Relief, Sleep, Focus, Anxiety
Offline download available for premium users

doc.title: LifeOS - Product Requirements Document
doc.snippet: Meditation library must include 20-30 guided meditations (5-20 min) across categories: Stress Relief, Sleep, Focus, Anxiety. Audio streaming required. Offline download for premium tier.

doc.title: LifeOS - Product Requirements Document
doc.snippet: Audio must stream reliably with <500ms start latency. Support for background playback. Offline download for premium users. Audio format: MP3 128kbps for bandwidth efficiency.

doc.title: Epic 4: Mind & Emotion - Story 4.1
doc.snippet: Implement meditation library with 20-30 meditations, categories, search/filter, favorites, audio streaming, and offline download (premium). Foundation for meditation player (Story 4.2).

doc.title: LifeOS - System Architecture
doc.snippet: Mind & Emotion module at features/mind_emotion/. Use clean architecture layers. Audio service in core/services/audio_service.dart. Supabase Storage for meditation audio files.

doc.title: LifeOS - System Architecture
doc.snippet: Favorites and completion tracking sync via Drift-Supabase sync. Downloaded audio files stored locally in app documents directory. Online-first for library content (can cache).

doc.title: Monetization Strategy
doc.snippet: Free tier: stream all meditations. Premium tier: offline download unlimited meditations. Upsell on download button for free users with premium benefits modal.

code.note: New Mind & Emotion module. Create base structure at lib/features/mind_emotion/. Audio service may be reusable from core services if exists, otherwise create new.

package.name: flutter_riverpod
package.usage: State management for library UI and data flow

package.name: drift
package.usage: Local SQLite for favorites, downloads, sessions

package.name: supabase_flutter
package.usage: Database sync and audio file storage

package.name: dio
package.usage: Audio file download with progress tracking

package.name: path_provider
package.usage: Get app directories for audio downloads

constraint.details: Create Mind & Emotion module at lib/features/mind_emotion/ with presentation/, domain/, data/ layers. Audio service in core/services/ for reusability.

constraint.description: Hybrid sync for favorites and completion tracking (D3)
constraint.details: Favorites and sessions save to Drift first, sync to Supabase when online. Library content fetched from Supabase, cached locally for offline browsing.
meditations table: id (UUID), title (TEXT), description (TEXT), duration_seconds (INT), category (ENUM), audio_url (TEXT), thumbnail_url (TEXT), created_at. Index on category for fast filtering.

constraint.description: Audio file storage in Supabase Storage
constraint.details: Store audio files in Supabase Storage bucket "meditation-audio" with public access. File naming: {meditation_id}.mp3. Use CDN URL for streaming. MP3 format, 128kbps, mono for smaller file size.

constraint.description: RLS policies for favorites and sessions
constraint.details: Enable RLS on meditation_favorites and meditation_sessions tables. Policy: USING (auth.uid() = user_id) for user data isolation. meditations table has public read access (no RLS).
Use audio preloading when user taps meditation card. Buffer first 5 seconds for instant playback. Show buffering indicator if network slow.
Debounce search input by 300ms to avoid excessive filtering on every keystroke. Show loading indicator during search.
Heart icon animates with scale + color transition on tap. Use AnimatedScale widget. Haptic feedback on favorite toggle (HapticFeedback.lightImpact()).

constraint.description: Premium tier check for offline download
constraint.details: Check user tier before allowing download. Free users see premium upsell modal with benefits: "Download unlimited meditations for offline use. Upgrade to Premium." Implement tier check in domain layer.
Max 3 concurrent downloads to avoid network congestion. Queue additional downloads. Show progress bar for each download (0-100%). Cancel download on user request.
Use ListView.builder for efficient rendering. Thumbnail images cached with cached_network_image. Lazy loading for large libraries (pagination if >100 meditations in future).
Unit tests for use cases, repositories, filters. Widget tests for library UI, search, categories. Integration test for complete meditation browsing and download flow.

interface.name: MeditationEntity
interface.notes: Use @freezed for immutability. isFavorited/isDownloaded computed from separate tables. completionCount from sessions table.

interface.name: GetMeditationsUseCase
interface.notes: Returns filtered list based on parameters. Fetches from Supabase, merges with local favorites/download status.

interface.name: ToggleFavoriteUseCase
interface.notes: Returns new favorite state (true/false). Saves to Drift first, syncs to Supabase. Handles offline gracefully.

interface.name: DownloadMeditationUseCase
interface.notes: Returns stream for progress updates. Check tier before starting. Download audio to app documents. Save file path to meditation_downloads table.

interface.name: MeditationRepository
interface.notes: Implemented by MeditationRepositoryImpl in data layer. Uses SupabaseDataSource for meditations, DriftDataSource for favorites/downloads.

interface.name: meditations table (Supabase)
interface.notes: Public read access (no RLS). Seed with 20-30 meditation entries. Audio files in Supabase Storage.

interface.name: meditation_favorites table (Supabase & Drift)
interface.notes: RLS policy: USING (auth.uid() = user_id). Mirror in Drift for offline support. Sync bidirectionally.

interface.name: meditation_downloads table (Drift only)
interface.notes: Local only table (no Supabase sync). Tracks downloaded audio files. Check if file exists on disk before marking as downloaded.

interface.name: meditation_sessions table (Supabase & Drift)
interface.notes: RLS policy: USING (auth.uid() = user_id). Tracks completion for each meditation play. Used by Story 4.2 for completion tracking.

tests.standards: Follow 70/20/10 testing pyramid: 70% unit tests (use cases, repositories, entities, filters), 20% widget tests (library UI, search, category tabs, cards), 10% integration tests (end-to-end flows). Use flutter_test for unit/widget tests, integration_test for E2E. Mock audio streaming with test files. Target 80%+ code coverage.

test-idea.approach: Mock repository with 25 meditation entries. Assert returned list has 25 items. Verify duration range 5-20 min (300-1200 seconds). Verify all 4 categories present.

test-idea.description: Unit test: Search and filter logic
test-idea.approach: Create list of 10 meditations. Apply search query "stress". Verify only matching meditations returned. Apply category filter "Sleep". Verify only sleep meditations returned. Test combined filters.
Mock repository. Call toggleFavorite with meditation ID. Verify repository.toggleFavorite called. Test toggle on → off → on states.
Mock just_audio player. Call playMeditation(). Verify audio source set to correct URL. Verify play() called. Test buffering state handling.
Mock tier service to return "free". Call downloadMeditation(). Verify returns TierRestrictionError. Mock tier as "premium". Verify download starts successfully.
Mock Dio download with progress callbacks. Stream progress: 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%. Verify DownloadProgress emitted with correct percentages. Verify file saved to documents directory.
Mock sessions repository. Record meditation completion. Verify session saved with completed=true, completed_at timestamp, full duration listened.

test-idea.description: Widget test: Library displays category tabs
test-idea.approach: Render MeditationLibraryScreen. Verify tabs present: All, Stress Relief, Sleep, Focus, Anxiety. Tap "Sleep" tab. Verify only sleep meditations displayed.

test-idea.description: Widget test: Search bar filters meditations
test-idea.approach: Render library with 10 meditations. Enter "focus" in search bar. Wait 300ms (debounce). Verify only meditations with "focus" in title/description shown.

test-idea.description: Widget test: Favorite heart icon toggles
test-idea.approach: Render MeditationCard with isFavorited=false. Tap heart icon. Verify icon animates. Verify state updates to isFavorited=true. Tap again. Verify returns to false.

test-idea.description: Integration test: Browse, favorite, and download meditation
test-idea.approach: Launch app. Navigate to Mind & Emotion tab. Verify library loads. Tap category "Stress Relief". Favorite a meditation. Verify saved to database. Tap download (as premium user). Verify file downloaded to device. Verify meditation card shows "Downloaded" badge.

test-idea.description: Integration test: Audio streaming from library
test-idea.approach: Select meditation from library. Tap play. Verify audio starts within 500ms. Verify player UI appears (Story 4.2 dependency). Play for 10 seconds. Pause. Verify session tracked.

devAgentRecord.notes: Story context prepared and validated for development assignment
